SEARCH
Package animals

Class Animal

java.lang.Object
animals.Animal
Direct Known Subclasses:
BabyDragon, Bat, Bear, Chance, PirateDragon, Salamander, Spider
public abstract class Animal extends Object
Animal class is an abstract class that represents entities classified as animals, and it is composed of game components of Fiery Dragons game. Animals including Spider, Bat, Salamander, Pirate Dragon and Baby Dragon. Modified by:
